subtitle: so it comes down to how we see ourselves
as people if the purpose of life is to
be comfortable
as comfortable as you can
and I'm working just to become more
comfortable
then apathy will become the cancer that
it is that undermines and weakens
and every possible way deteriorates and
erodes the very essence of what a soul
is and the soul is a living
fiery passionate entities called
actually a flame
it's Restless it flickers it's
Transcendent in nature
however if we see ourselves as Souls

we like to be comfortable
